attributes.action: Requre all children from the age of 6 to take part in at least 3 hours of extra curricular activities per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All children turning six should be required by law to take part in at least 3 hours of extra curricular activities per week outside of School time, this could be anything from after school clubs, Scouts, Guides, Cadets, sports clubs etc., they should be required to do this until they are 16. Children need to learn to be responsible, work together, tolerate and respect people, be healthy. this would have a major impact on anti social behaviour in today's society
